features: 💖 EXQUISITE FEMININE CARE WASH: Boric Fresh pH Balancing Feminine Wash offers a superb option for your feminine hygiene requirements. This organic cleanser boasts of its gentleness suitable for daily use. It aids in cleansing the vulva from undesired smells, rendering a sensation of freshness, rejuvenation, and invigorating confidence.

🍃 PURELY NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Discover the harmonious mix of naturally-sourced ingredients in our product such as boric acid, coconut oil, jojoba oil, tea tree oil, lavender oil, aloe vera juice, and chamomile.

🚫 AVOIDANCE OF HARSH CHEMICALS: Move away from stringent chemicals in your feminine hygiene routine. Our formulation is fragrance-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, and made in the USA, crafted with the intention to be gentle on sensitive skin.
😔 EFFORTLESS TO USE: Streamline your feminine care routine with our uncomplicated 4-step process: apply, lather, rinse, and pat dry.
✅ SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If you are not satisfied with our product, enjoy hassle-free return within 30 day of your purchase.
body.description: Boric Fresh FAQ Can the feminine wash help with recurrent irritation? Yes, BoricFresh contains an effective pH-balanced formula with boric acid to help balance the pH and reduce the risk of recurrent irritation when used as directed. Is it safe for sensitive skin? BoricFresh is completely safe for sensitive skin! Our formulation is free of fragrance, parabens, and sulfates, making it gentle and non-irritating for all skin types. How long does it take to work? BoricFresh provides immediate relief and optimal results are achieved with daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves you with a fresh feeling
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried this wash and I'm delighted with the results! The gentle formula leaves me feeling fresh and confident all day. Its subtle fragrance and pH balance make it a standout choice for maintaining feminine hygiene. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For those who are sensitive!
reviews.reviewText: So I've tried a lot of feminine washes because during my cycle I want to be as fresh as possible, most claim to balance your PH as well as maintaining the highest level of sensitivity and for me it results in a massive itch fest or skin peeling. However my lady parts have found a solution! The ingredients aren't just listed in the bottle you can actually feel the difference. The tea tree smell isn't over powering yet it creates a nice clean feeling. The moisturizers create a silky feeling that last long after the shower and to out it lightly maybe a little too long after because my evening was 🔥🔥🔥 my husband can attest to that. All in all I have zero complaints I used it for several days before writing my review just to ensure my experience wasn’t an anomaly. I’m pleased to say it isn’t! So if there’s a lack of availability then blame me because when I find something great I like to stock up just in case. I’m 40 and a mother of 3! So if you are still debating then there’s your sign! Thank me later ciao!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars the size do not match the price
reviews.reviewText: my bottle came it had spilled all in the box..the bottle is very small for the price ....i loved it but because of the price and my bottle was spilled ....i wont buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: While the scent could be improved, it works like it should to get you back into balance and keep you there. I have used several products of this sort by well known brands and while their scents are fabulous they don’t get you back into balance like this product does. This is my new favorite and in my regular rotation to keep balance in my life. Please make some other scents!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Open on Delivery
reviews.reviewText: Product was leaking and not much in the bottle. Too expensive for this type of delivery. Manufacturer needs more secure packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: I am fairy crunchy and always leery about vaginal washes. I’m very familiar with how good boric acid and tea tree oil are even on your most sensitive parts and I’m not gonna lie this summer humidity has me all sweaty and not smelling so sweet. I found this and decided to give it ago. This stuff works great! There is definitely been a noticeable difference even the day after use. It’s not like a cover the smells with perfume it’s literally the lack of any scent that is perfect! It also leaves a cooling clean feeling. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fragrance Is Too Subtle
reviews.reviewText: The scent is pleasant but it's a bit too mild for my liking. Any type of body wash/soap that I buy, I prefer to have something with a good amount of fragrance. I don't want something overpowering, but I want something that I can definitely enjoy the aroma of.The consistency of the product is good, and it's not runny or watery. I was a little disappointed with the amount of lather, though. It didn't provide as much lather as the body wash I typically use, but overall it does what it's supposed to as far as cleansing and freshening the skin.A couple of positive attributes are that it's cruelty free and made in the USA with no artificial dyes or colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I am super impressed with this wash! As a woman who is over 40, I have started to notice changes in my body. I was looking for something to help balance things. This has been perfect so far. The scent is perfect, the effectiveness of the wash is perfect and it’s even in a very easily useable bottle. I love that it’s organic, paraben and sulfate free! I also love that it has no dyes and is cruelty free, which is very important to me I have recommended this to friends and family and will continue to purchase myself.
